name: Kimberly-Clark Corporation
goal:
Kimberly-Clark manufactures products for the consumer and B2B markets enhancing people’s health, hygiene and well-being. Its well-known brands include Andrex®, Depend®, Huggies®, Kimberly-Clark Professional®, Kleenex®, Kotex® and Scott®.

Kimberly-Clark Europe is based in United Kingdom and operates as a subsidiary of the Kimberly-Clark Corporation. The Kimberly-Clark Corporation has a heritage of over 140 years and its brands are sold 175 countries around the world. Please visit http://www.kimberly-clark.com for the latest news and information about Kimberly-Clark and its brands.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Product legislation
Data protection & privacy
Consumer policy
Trade policy
Circular Economy
Single-Use Plastics
e-commerce
